name: psref
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cps), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c0, c1))

stmt.origin: imp(wcel(c0, cps), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cps), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cps), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, c0, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c0]c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ PosetRel →(c1 ∈ c2 → c1[c0]c1))
